document_data.name: Frostrill
document_data.caption: ''Map of Druarwood, including the location of Frostrill.''
document_data.mainbody: '''Frostrill''' was a small thorp located in the [[Druarwood]], north of the [[Moonwood]] and the [[Cold Wood]], in the [[Silver Marches]].
